events.content: A remix of Mariya Takeuchi's song Plastic Love goes viral after being frequently recommended to people by the YouTube algorithm.
MAGFest 2019 begins, with representatives from SiIvaGunner attending once again.

events.title: The Real SiIvaGunner ***Please watch Q&A for full story***
events.content: Youtube rejects the counter-claims submitted by SiIvaGunner, and the channel is forcefully terminated. The team, who is stuck at MAGFest and unable to appeal the decision, guides viewers to SiIvaGunner2.

events.title: Second Termination [FILE-19] - Haltmann's Archives
events.content: The SiIva AI begins to malfunction as a result of the channel's termination. In order to prevent a repeat of GiIvaSunner's 'death' from 2016, Haltmann Works pumps SiIvaGunner full of Christmas Spirit in order to keep him alive (see FILE-02).
At the same time, AIRTH experiences complete societal breakdown with the absence of the channel, complete with worlwide riots, government shutdowns and economic collapse.

events.title: An Essential Announcement
events.content: An assortment of SiIvaGunner's most popular and historically significant rips are uploaded to SiIvaGunner2 as part of GiIvaSunner's third anniversary.

events.title: Elliot's Theme - Garry's Mod
events.content: SiIvaGunner loses his copyright infringement case against Sony and is sent to YouTube's copyright school. In the end, however, he exacts his revenge on Sony Music with a team composed of The Voice Inside Your Head, Xarlable, NBGMusic, and Will Smith.
Youtube finally accepts SiIvaGunner's counter-claims, allowing the channel to be brought back in 2 weeks if Sony does not respond.

events.title: We're back
events.content: Sony fails to respond within the 2 week deadline, and SiIvaGunner is reinstated. Season 3's finale immediately begins. The SiIva AI becomes responsive again.

events.title: Garlic-Flavored Tacos [FILE-16] - Haltmann's Archives
events.content: The Joke-Explainer™ 7000 replica takes a bite from a Garlic Taco, transporting her to the AI universe. Andonuts is riddled with guilt, regretting taking the replica's existence for granted.

events.title: Reveal Trailer - SilvaGunner: King for Another Day Tournament
events.content: After being teased in the comic that ended the Grinch's takeover and at MAGFest 2019, The King for Another Day Tournament is formally announced and revealed, with 12 contenders from the original King for a Day Tournament slated to return.
19 new contenders are announced for the King for Another Day Tournament through a series of 12 videos starting with Plant - Cave Story, including 3 SiIva Directs.

The Life and Times of Wade L.D. is released as the final video of Season 3; despite being a side story, the video contains revelations that radically shift the landscape of the Christmas Comeback Crisis.

events.title: The Life and Times of Wade L.D. - A SilvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis Side Story
events.content: Just after the events of Old Times, a Waddle Dee by the name of Wade L.D. starts his employment at Haltmann Works Company as an Administrative Secretary to support his wife Wanda and chronically ill son Jimmy. One of his first assignments is a survey of SiIvaGunner's house. While going out for a drink with his coworkers, one coworker, named Chase, introduces him to the music of Maroon 5. He then picks up some Ripodine for Jimmy before returning home.

The narrative then skips to just after Haltmann, where Wade L.D. performs a survey of The Voice's barracks. He sends Haltmann information regarding Angry Joe's planned assault on the North Pole (as depicted in Advent of Hell).

We then flash forward to the events of Last Hurrah, where Haltmann alerts Wade L.D. of the Voice not holding up his end of the bargain. He reports scents of garlic and guacamole to Wade and asks him to investigate it.

Around the time of Loves the Ladies, Dr. Andonuts requests a total of 100kg of various metals from Wade for a secret project. Around the same time, Haltmann Works researchers begin experimenting with recreating and harnessing the powers of the Garlic Taco, but after making a major breakthrough, the taco is stolen by a mysterious robed woman. Haltmann puts up a $1667820000 for its recovery.

Wade L.D. is then sent on another reconnaissance mission, this time to the North Pole to review the damage caused by Angry Joe's operation in Advent of Hell. Shortly after this, Wade is contacted by a mysterious lady who promises an escape from 'limbo'. Jimmy's illness continues to worsen, and Wanda takes him to the hospital.

At this point, the events of Loves the Ladies have passed, with Haltmann terminating his contract with the Voice. He instructs his employees, including Wade L.D., to begin building and gathering parts for the Gadgetini Clone 2.0 to usurp him. Wade surveys the base of the Rappers' Union with Charles Barkley. Wade also begins to take drugs to cope with the stresses of work, culminating in him causing a 12 hour intranet outage whilst being under the influence.

In order to both apologise for his actions and keep his job, Wade bribes Haltmann, who forgives him; despite this, he docks his pay by 20% as punishment. Shortly thereafter, Wade's request for a research team to analyse a sample of SiIvaGunner is granted, and the team assigned to it create AIRTHs (Artificially Intelligent Rip Theatricalizers), which share the same basic characteristics as SiIvaGunner but vary in their theming, and which the team has no control over.

After being pressed on all sides by work, his wife, his son's terminal illnes and Chase's increasingly threatening demands for cocaine, Wade goes to the Quality Bar to vent to the mysterious woman, who reveals she is the one who stole the Garlic Taco from HWC. She instructs Wade to meet her at Warehouse F36, where she reveals both the existence of a timelock and her identity as 2B from Nier: Automata, desperately wanted by Haltmann for her portal-making technology.

With the police, Chaze and Jeff hot on their trail and only one bite remaining in the Taco, Wade decides to sacrifice himself to let 2B escape, killing Chase and a policeman before disabling a Patrol-Bot that was recording the chase. Wade is presumed dead, his position opens up, and the world continues without him. After the end of Wade's saga, it is revealed that the SiIvaGunner channel had been hosted by an experimental AI since 2018.

events.title:
The SiIva AI [FILE-17] - Haltmann's Archives
The Silva AI Timeline: A Summary of Events [FILE-INT-AIRTH] - Haltmann's Archives
events.content: HWC launches the Quality of Control network to aid in further increasing the quality of the SiIva AI's network, and the real SiIvaGunner is placed in a controlled dream environment dubbed Illucidity to assist in the QoC's effectiveness. The two systems run in parallel and enter a positive feedback loop.
Unusual Circumstances is released as part of the channel's annual April Fools' Day event. The video acts as a pastiche of the channel's termination earlier that year in the form of an actual lawsuit.

events.title: Unusual Circumstances - A SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis Side Story
events.content: Wood Man fills in for SiIvaGunner in his case against Sony Music Entertainment Japan and Phoenix Wright. Judge Jerome presides over the case, with Wood Man being represented by John Notwoodman.

Phoenix Wright gives his opening statement, saying that his client claims that SiIvaGunner infringed on Sony's copyright and that his YouTube channel should be terminated because of it. John Notwoodman responds by saying that SiIvaGunner's use of Sony's material was in complete compliance with fair use, as Wood Man mysteriously disappears.

Pheonix presents the 7 offending rips as evidence and calls Mr. Youtube to the stand. Pheonix surmises that Youtube's automated copyright system flagged the rips, and states that anyone who breaches copyright in this manner shouldn't be on Youtube in the first place. Phoenix then tries to call Bane as a witness but John objects on grounds of self-incrimination, to which Judge Jerome agrees.

Pheonix then calls in his final witness, the Grinch. The Grinch proceeds to claim that he owned the songs used in the offending rips and that they infringe on both his and Sony's copyright. Wright is just about to dismiss the Grinch when Notwoodman steps in to say it's his turn with the witnesses, and his first one just so happens to be the Grinch - Phoenix objects, but Jerome rules again in John's favour.

After lunch break, John Notwoodman starts by getting the Grinch to admit that he never tried to stop the claimed rips from being uploaded, meaning that he allowed the use of Sony material. He then summons Count Cannoli (who is quickly shot by Mr. Rental before saying anything of note), Nozomi Tojo (who doesn't actually give any evidence) and another Jerome (who also doesn't actually give any evidence and falls head-first into a DEEZ NUTS joke).

With both parties having presented their cases, the jury gives SiIvaGunner a 'Not Guilty' verdict, to which Judge Jerome agrees. Phoenix loses it, saying that John's use of the Grinch was illegal when he wasn't allowed to use Bane - he proceeds to punch John and rips off his mustache before being arrested for contempt of court. Wood Man and Bane then go to get some 'victory lunch' without the Grinch.

events.title: Second Termination [FILE-19] - Haltmann's Archives
events.content: Dr. Andonuts releases an internal memo regarding the events of the Termination, blaming the SiIva AI (which had assumed the personality of the Grinch) giving Sony evidence of the channel's breaches of copyright.

events.title: SiIva Direct 4.1.2019
events.content: A MOJO!! for the King for Another Day Tournament is announced, directly inspired by the Smash Bros. DOJO!! from Super Smash Bros. Brawl.

events.title:
Anal BGM 3 - Fuck the Erotic Sexster
Holiday Spirit [FILE-INT-FOOLS] - Haltmann's Archives
events.content: An HWC R&D experiment involving Spark the Electric Jester and Valentine's Spirit goes horribly wrong.

events.title: SiIva Direct • SiIva Lighthouse Live | E3 2019
events.content: Following a series of events concerning his mental health, the team announces that Etika will be removed from the King for Another Day Tournament due to concerns that the unwanted attention from the event could negatively affect his well-being.
A cryptic apology video is uploaded at midnight to TR1Iceman, one of Etika's side channels. Shortly thereafter, Etika commits suicide by jumping off the Manhattan Bridge, and is reported missing.
Etika's body is recovered from the East River, and he is confirmed dead.
PopCultureCorn uploads a fake leak of the King for Another Day Tournament's roster to 4chan's /mu/ board and r/GilvaSunner.

A troll page for Mr. Bean is created on the King for Another Day Tournament MOJO!!, consisting of the Green de la Bean image and an audio post with a YouTube Poop-style edit of the "It's Spagett!" sketch from Tim and Eric Awesome Show, Great Job!.
Undertale: Halloween Hack - an alternate interpretation of Undertale inspired by Earthbound's Halloween Hack - is released on MS Paint Fan Adventures.

events.title:
Trailer Theme - Five Nights at Freddy's 3
Main Menu - Five Nights at Freddy's 3
events.content: Spreingtrep has dinner with King Harkinian; he then begins singing a spoof of the Five Nights at Freddy's 1 Song by The Living Tombstone.

events.title: Sex - Steve Harvey
events.content: A Porygon attempts to murder Steve Harvey. Steve Harvey's immortal hand of doom stops him, however.

events.title: You Guessed It! - SilvaGunner: King for Another Day Tournament
events.content: A joke announcement for Mr. Bean is uploaded.

events.title: SilvaGunner: King for Another Day Tournament Direct 9.21.2019 (Beta Mix)
events.content: A joke announcement premiers posing as a real KFAD Direct, introducing a bevy of fake characters such as Naxx Guyfieri and the Cool Meme Team. The real direct premieres 30 minutes later.

events.title: SiIvaGunner: King for Another Day Tournament Direct 9.21.2019
events.content: Five new contenders are revealed (Donkey Kong, MissingNo. The Jazz Cats, Eminem and Law and Disorder), bringing the tournament's cast to a final number of 32 contenders. Etika's place as part of the Joy-Con Men is taken by Bill Trinen and the duo is renamed to Nintendo Power. Meowth and Unregistered Hypercam 2 (the winner of the original KFAD) are named as co-hosts.
